main event: A round reddish-orange object was observed over Bolar, Virginia on January 25, 1965 around 11:15 PM and again around 10:45 PM the same night.
interesting points: The object hovered and was observed for at least 45 minutes at a time.
The object emitted flashing lights that appeared to be either blue or green in color.
The object would suddenly disappear and then reappear in the same general area.
The witnesses could not tell if the object was on the ground or hovering.
The residents of the small village of Bolar are cautious about discussing sightings in the area.
